title: SQL Workbase
description: SQLWorkbase, created in Java Swing, allows user to visualize their SQL Server databases and tables in a table view by utilizing JDBC drivers. By entering their SQL Server username and password, users can access all their databases and tables, which are displayed in a JTree Panel.
